Description of incident: Hackers managed to obtain a number of administrative usernames and passwords for the PBS website.  PBS became aware of the intrusion when a phony news story was placed on the website in late May.  The login information for over 200 database users was later posted on the internet.  Hackers then began releasing additional information on the PBS website and member database.  The names, addresses, email addresses of subscribers. The hackers claim that they may release phone numbers and passwords of PBS members as well.  Wyoming PBS was also breached.
